com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

クラス NCMBObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBBase
      • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBObject
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    NCMBInstallation, NCMBUser

    public class NCMBObject
extends NCMBBase
    NCMBObject is used to retrieve and upload the data in data store

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void addToList(java.lang.String key, java.util.List objects)
      add objects to given key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
      void addUniqueToList(java.lang.String key, java.util.List objects)
      add objects if object is unique in the specified key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
      void deleteObject()
      delete current NCMBObject from data store
      void deleteObjectInBackground(DoneCallback callback)
      delete current NCMBObject from data store asynchronously
      void fetch()
      fetch current NCMBObject data from data store
      void fetchInBackground()
      Get object in Background without callback
      void fetchInBackground(FetchCallback callback)
      fetch current NCMBObject data from data store asynchronously
      void increment(java.lang.String key, int amount)
      increment the value of the specified key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
      void removeFromList(java.lang.String key, java.util.List objects)
      remove objects from array in the given key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
      void save()
      save current NCMBObject to data store
      void saveInBackground(DoneCallback callback)
      save current NCMBObject to data store asynchronously

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • NCMBObject

        public NCMBObject(java.lang.String className)
        Constructor with class name
        パラメータ:
        className - class name for data store

    • メソッドの詳細

      • save

        public void save()
          throws NCMBException
        save current NCMBObject to data store
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • saveInBackground

        public void saveInBackground(DoneCallback callback)
        save current NCMBObject to data store asynchronously
        パラメータ:
        callback - callback after object save

      • fetch

        public void fetch()
           throws NCMBException
        fetch current NCMBObject data from data store
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • fetchInBackground

        public void fetchInBackground()
        Get object in Background without callback

      • fetchInBackground

        public void fetchInBackground(FetchCallback callback)
        fetch current NCMBObject data from data store asynchronously
        パラメータ:
        callback - callback after fetch data

      • deleteObject

        public void deleteObject()
                  throws NCMBException
        delete current NCMBObject from data store
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • deleteObjectInBackground

        public void deleteObjectInBackground(DoneCallback callback)
        delete current NCMBObject from data store asynchronously
        パラメータ:
        callback - callback after delete object

      • increment

        public void increment(java.lang.String key,
                      int amount)
               throws NCMBException
        increment the value of the specified key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
        パラメータ:
        key - field name to increment value
        amount - increment amount number
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from sdk internal

      • addToList

        public void addToList(java.lang.String key,
                      java.util.List objects)
               throws NCMBException
        add objects to given key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
        パラメータ:
        key - field name to add objects
        objects - objects to add
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from sdk internal

      • addUniqueToList

        public void addUniqueToList(java.lang.String key,
                            java.util.List objects)
                     throws NCMBException
        add objects if object is unique in the specified key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
        パラメータ:
        key - field name to add objects
        objects - objects to add
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from sdk internal

      • removeFromList

        public void removeFromList(java.lang.String key,
                           java.util.List objects)
                    throws NCMBException
        remove objects from array in the given key this method is effective for the saved object that contains value of the specified key
        パラメータ:
        key - field name to remove objects
        objects - objects to remove
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from sdk internal
